00019   void HcalTrackLarsEngine::registerParameters()
00020   {
00021     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_ahcHitsColName",
00022                                                    "name of collection containing AHC CalorimeterHits",
00023                                                    _ahcHitsColName,
00024                                                    std::string("AhcCalorimeter_Hits") );
00025     
00026     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_tcmHitsColName",
00027                                                    "name of collection containing TCM CalorimeterHits",
00028                                                    _tcmHitsColName,
00029                                                    std::string("TcmCalorimeter_Hits") );
00030     
00031     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_trackColName",
00032                                                    "name of collection containing tracks (LCCluster)",
00033                                                    _trackColName,
00034                                                    std::string("AhcTracksNN") );
00035     
00036   }

00043   /*********************************************************************************/
00044    void HcalTrackLarsEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00045   {
00046     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_NTracks",    &_event.NTracks,     "NTracks/I");
00047     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_AhcEnergy",  &_event.AhcEnergy,   "AhcEnergy/D");
00048     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_TcmtEnergy", &_event.TcmtEnergy,  "TcmtEnergy/D");
00049     
00050     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_NHits",         "vector<int>",    &_event.t_NHits);
00051     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_NLength",       "vector<int>",    &_event.t_NLength);
00052     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_StartLayer",    "vector<int>",    &_event.t_StartLayer);
00053     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_StopLayer",     "vector<int>",    &_event.t_StopLayer);
00054     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_CosPhi",        "vector<double>", &_event.t_CosPhi);
00055     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_trackHitIndex", "vector<int>",    &_event.t_trackHitIndex);
00056     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_h_Energy",      "vector<double>", &_event.t_h_Energy);
00057     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_h_I",           "vector<int>",    &_event.t_h_I);
00058     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_h_J",           "vector<int>",    &_event.t_h_J);
00059     hostTree->Branch("trkLars_h_K",           "vector<int>",    &_event.t_h_K);
00060   }

00062   /*********************************************************************************/
00063   /*                                                                               */
00064   /*                                                                               */
00065   /*                                                                               */
00066   /*********************************************************************************/
00067   void HcalTrackLarsEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00068   {
00069     /*Initialize variables (otherwise variables may keep values from previous events)*/
00070     _event.NTracks = 0;
00071     _event.AhcEnergy = 0;
00072     _event.TcmtEnergy = 0;
00073     _event.t_NHits.clear();
00074     _event.t_NLength.clear();
00075     _event.t_StartLayer.clear();
00076     _event.t_StopLayer.clear();
00077     _event.t_CosPhi.clear();
00078     _event.t_trackHitIndex.clear();
00079     _event.t_h_Energy.clear();
00080     _event.t_h_I.clear();
00081     _event.t_h_J.clear();
00082     _event.t_h_K.clear();
00083     
00084 
00085     /*loop over collections*/
00086     _event.AhcEnergy = getSumOfCaloHits(evt, _ahcHitsColName);
00087     _event.TcmtEnergy = getSumOfCaloHits(evt, _tcmHitsColName);
00088 
00089     try
00090       {
00091         LCCollection* lccTracks = evt->getCollection(_trackColName);
00092         
00093         _event.NTracks = lccTracks->getNumberOfElements();
00094         int trackIndex = 0;
00095         
00096         _event.t_NHits.resize(_event.NTracks);
00097         _event.t_NLength.resize(_event.NTracks);
00098         _event.t_CosPhi.resize(_event.NTracks);
00099         _event.t_StartLayer.resize(_event.NTracks);
00100         _event.t_StopLayer.resize(_event.NTracks);
00101         
00102         _event.t_trackHitIndex.resize(_event.NTracks);
00103         
00104         int nTracks = lccTracks->getNumberOfElements();
00105         for (int iTrack = 0; iTrack < nTracks; ++iTrack)
00106           {
00107             Cluster* lcTrack = dynamic_cast<lcio::Cluster*>(lccTracks->getElementAt(iTrack));
00108             CalorimeterHitVec hits = lcTrack->getCalorimeterHits();
00109             
00110             int NHits = hits.size();
00111             
00112             _event.t_NHits.at(iTrack) = NHits;
00113             _event.t_CosPhi.at(iTrack) = lcTrack->getIPhi();        
00114             _event.t_StartLayer.at(iTrack) = CALICE::CellIndex(hits.front()->getCellID0()).getLayerIndex();
00115             _event.t_StopLayer.at(iTrack) = CALICE::CellIndex(hits.back()->getCellID0()).getLayerIndex();
00116             _event.t_NLength.at(iTrack) = 1 + _event.t_StopLayer.at(iTrack) - _event.t_StartLayer.at(iTrack);
00117             
00118             _event.t_trackHitIndex.at(iTrack) = trackIndex;
00119             
00120             for (int iHit = 0; iHit < NHits; ++iHit)
00121               {
00122                 CalorimeterHit* lcHit = hits.at(iHit);
00123                 trackIndex++;
00124                 
00125                 _event.t_h_Energy.push_back(lcHit->getEnergy());
00126 
00127                 CALICE::CellIndex idx(lcHit->getCellID0());
00128                 _event.t_h_I.push_back(idx.getPadColumn());
00129                 _event.t_h_J.push_back(idx.getPadRow());
00130                 _event.t_h_K.push_back(idx.getLayerIndex());
00131               }
00132           }
00133         
00134       }
00135     catch (DataNotAvailableException& e)
00136       {
00137         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "No Cluster with name " << _trackColName << " found" << endl;
00138       }
00139     
00140 
00141   }/*fillVariables*/
00142

00144   /*                                                                               */
00145   /*                                                                               */
00146   /*                                                                               */
00147   /*********************************************************************************/
00148   Double_t HcalTrackLarsEngine::getSumOfCaloHits(EVENT::LCEvent* evt, std::string collectionName)
00149   {
00150     try
00151       {
00152         LCCollection* lcc = evt->getCollection(collectionName);
00153         
00154         Double_t energySum = 0;
00155         
00156         for (int n = 0; n < lcc->getNumberOfElements(); n++)
00157           { 
00158             EVENT::CalorimeterHit* hit = dynamic_cast<EVENT::CalorimeterHit*>(lcc->getElementAt(n));
00159             if (hit)
00160               {
00161                 energySum += hit->getEnergy();
00162               }
00163         }
00164         
00165         return energySum;
00166     }
00167     catch (DataNotAvailableException& ignored)
00168     {
00169       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "No CalorimeterHit collection with name " << collectionName << " found" << endl;
00170       return 0.0;
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174 }/*namespace marlin*/
